name: Drudge Report
description:
Looking for a night / dark version? Try Drudge Report PM: http://userstyles.org/styles/90993/drudge-report-pm

Making Drudge Report more readable since 2007! • http://drudgereport.com/

A complete rework of drudgereport.com (well, as much as I could spackle css on such crusty html code), including an updated "web 2.0" logo, font beautification and link hover/visited prettiness. If you don't want to see ads, you should use AdBlock Plus.

style provided by Stephen VanDyke http://vforvandyke.com/

user.name: Stephen VanDyke
user.about: Just a guy making things pop on the internet.

additional_info:
February 10, 2018 • Updated logo to mostly B&W, a few minor fixes. Wow, over 10 years and not too many hiccups in the past couple of years! 
January 8, 2016 • Fixed the fonts on Windows back to Bitter, woops! Google changed things up and I hadn't noticed for a while (no new screenshot)
January 7, 2016 • Self/no link (usually news flashes/developing stories) with normal or red color will not transition to a dimmer, already visited state (no new screenshot)
March 5, 2015 • Hover transition added (no new screenshot)
January 2, 2014 • Fixed blue links to have muted color after visited (no new screenshot)
July 24, 2013 • DRUDGE REPORT PM IS THE OFFICIAL DARK THEME FORK - http://userstyles.org/styles/90993/drudge-report-pm
July 23, 2013 • fixed typos, validated code with userstyles.org (6 YEARS OLD, THANKS FOR CONTINUING TO MAKE THIS THE #1 DRUDGE THEME!)
December 7, 2012 • bumped font size a little (no new screenshot)
August 22, 2012 • Removed drudgereportarchives.com (no new screenshot)
August 21, 2012 • Removing cruft, refactoring and /*hwoa*/ adding comments (no new screenshot)
June 4, 2012 • Minor updates to link :hover, white/black instead of red/black, :visited is also slightly less muted
May 23, 2012 • Updated Drudge Report logo
April 28, 2012 • Nifty font from Google web fonts... "Bitter" heh
February 1, 2012 • Hides ad slot at top (until I can format it to not look stupid picking up background images, whatev)
October 8, 2011 • Tweaks with column spacing
May 12, 2011 • Fixed logo (where it should be instead of on top as I really wanted it, alas), also it is now finally clickable.
March 6, 2011 • Drudge's logo done gone away, don't worry I'm on it in a future update (it's been a while since anything broke).
October 13, 2009 • removed the gray space from between columns again after recent change (style may be in flux, hold tight and check back often if it is)
June 24, 2009 • Fix issues with td spacing/padding, red links change color to light pink when visited  
January 16, 2009 • Fixes several issues with spacing
November 28, 2008 • fixed issue where some stories weren't displayed (red links) THANKS zatbamboom!, hovering link bug fixed (no longer reverts to blue)
November 26, 2008 • removed gray spacer image between columns.
June 13, 2008 • fixed some spacing issues, please let me know if there are problems or things that could be cleaner.
